message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $12,500. Could you do $13,500? That would be a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
